pullrequest.title: ur10 robot taken from ros-industrial for testing in gazebo

content.raw:
I'd prefer it in urdf? it's a more generic format for wider audience, plus more incentive for me to keep urdf->sdf parser up-to-date :-)

~~~
gz sdf -p ur10.urdf > ur10.sdf
~~~
should work for this purpose.

Or at least we should keep urdf and sdf versions side by side... Thoughts?
